about_the_game:
Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon® is a classic platformer that focuses heavily on replayability. It takes inspiration and pays homage to the classic games of old using a hand drawn art style.

Play as the mighty DaKoo, a dragon with incredible powers and an insatiable thirst for adventure. Players embark on a series of daring quests, each one more challenging than the last. From battling numerous baddies to exploring vast environments, there is no shortage of excitement! What sets Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon apart from other games is its incredible attention to detail. The world of the game is richly imagined, with stunning visuals and intricate level designs that make every moment feel like a true adventure. As players progress through the game, they will encounter a wide variety of enemies, each with their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Players will need to use all of their wits and cunning to emerge victorious. But it’s not just about combat. Along the way, players will also need to solve puzzles to gather resources! Every interaction feels meaningful and engaging. An unforgettable gaming experience for all ages!

Use rocket ships to take on the enemy!

Use attacks on the ground or in the air to defend or attack enemies!

Use Fireballs to defend or attack enemies and bosses!

Navigate vortex levels through gravity zones using 90 and 180 degree turns!

Use jump combos to take on multiple enemies at the same time and destroy enemy factories!

Use 5 different shields to defend yourself all while traversing through 5 different environments plus multiple Vortex levels!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 20.01
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 6800 series or GeForce 500 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: some distros may require a user to update system and install libatomic1 package. may also run on earlier versions of linux but have not been tested
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 22.04
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 6870 or higher or GeForce 500 series or Higher that supports WebGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or better
  • Additional Notes: some distros may require a user to update system and install libatomic1 package. may also run on earlier versions of linux but have not been tested

short_description: Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon has over 150 levels, every run of the game is unique. Animations, enemy spawning, and attacks are all randomized to enhance the immersion. With multiple ways to attack you will take on 5 Bosses among multiple obstacles.
